Firepit Fridays

Fridays from 4:30 - 6:30PM
Winter Season: November – February

Join us in River Garden every Friday afternoon from November-February. We’ll light a couple of firepits and enjoy free s’mores, hot cocoa and more!

Fridays from 4:30 - 6:30PM
Winter Season: November – February

Join us in River Garden every Friday afternoon from November-February. We’ll light a couple of firepits and enjoy free s’mores, hot cocoa and more!
